CustomField.description: Determines if Current LPM contains a partner with a Prohibited selling status. Used in Dynamic Forms.
CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES(Current_LPM__c, "Aderant"), "True", null)& IF(INCLUDES(Current_LPM__c, "ProLaw"), "True ", null) & IF(INCLUDES (Current_LPM__c, "Thomson Reuters"), "True ", null)
CustomField.label: Current LPM Prohibited
